channel.title: 562 loading 604 client cache downloading help
channel.description:
Alright, I got the cache downloading onto a windows computer. However, in QS.java there is a code for user.home (which mac and linux use) however when I try to run the client on mac, it won't download the cache and it just states this
[code]Error: qs.a:192 qs.<init>:908 Class_a.a:220 client.main:828 | java.lang.RuntimeException [/code]
Here is the qs.java file where it has the user.home and cachedownload stuff - http://pastebin.com/K7EbGDYG
Can anyone help me out here?
